channel.title: Official Server Spawn Area [In Progress]
channel.description:
This thread is about the newly created city around the spawn point on the official server. Pictures of the actual area will be added soon, but for now I will provide an overhead of the map updated at least every other day (until it is complete) that has the actual square-by-square details of this well organized town.
Before I move into details, I'd first like to give some credits:
[ul][li]Strike (StrikeMC on forums) - He may not be well known here on the forums, but over the past two days we have become good MC friends. He has put in countless hours with me building this town. Accredited for: Flattening the area [destroying an old castle, placing countless pieces of dirt over the water and other areas], attaching the highway to the city, adding the walls to the highway, building the town [walls, roads, fences][/li] [li]xxx123xxx - Last night he also helped Strike and I, would have taken much longer without him. Accredited for: Flattening the area [destroying an old castle, placing countless pieces of dirt over the water and other areas], building the town [walls][/li] [li]Many others - There were quite a few people that put their time and effort into flattening out the main area for around 2 hours before Strike, xxx123xxx, and I took over for the rest. Thanks a lot to them too. Accredited for: Flattening the area [destroying the tree house, flattening the main area around spawn][/li][/ul]
With the thank you's out of the way, I will go into a bit more detail about this city: This so far un-named city (post name ideas!) will be the starting place for all new players of the server, as well as the place you go when you die. It will feature a blacksmiths (furnaces and crafting benches), a bank (tons of chests), a hotel, a tree farm, a few individual rent-a-homes, and possibly a wheat farm. There are 12 exits/entrances to the city (4 main ones), gold plated and attached to the roads. The roads divide the city into 16 plots, making it easy to navigate.
[u][b]Overhead map:[/b][/u] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/6310/spawngrid.png[/img]
Plots:
[ul][li]13 - City Tree Farm[/li] [li]6, 7, 10, 11 - Closest to the spawn, these will be the required features. (See below)[/li][/ul]
Needed features:
[ul][li]Blacksmith - sly_greg[/li] [li]Bank - Davidi2 [/li] [li]Hotel (2 adjacent plots; bridge going over the road between them) - TBD[/li][/ul]
Post your comments :)

item.title: Official Server Spawn Area [In Progress]
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Then what are the portals for?

If it’s complete nether, why would you need a portal to get to there?[/quote]
Portals can only be used on single player, where the nether and earth work.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server Spawn Area [In Progress]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Then what are the portals for?

If it’s complete nether, why would you need a portal to get to there?[/quote]

They are for nothing. Cole is right, the server can either be in the nether or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server Spawn Area [In Progress]
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

You can either have complete nether or complete earth. For some reason it doesn’t go both ways. I’m sure there’s a way to make random fires with soul sand and netherrack and enemies and lava, but it wouldn’t be the real “Nether”.

Read full topic
